## Fall 2023

### 1. What were we solving for in the Exponential RV example?

In this example, I was demonstrating how we could make a joint pdf from $n$ exponential distributions. The joint pdf was for the random variable $M$, which was the minimum of 
 randomly distributed arrival times ($X_i$).
